00054

00062 
00067         void SetBackground(AreaDraw *background)
00068         {
00069                 wxREPLACE(m_background, background);
00070                 FirePlotNeedRedraw();

00072

00079                 m_textNoData = textNoData;
00080                 FirePlotNeedRedraw();
00081         }
